lead_paragraph: At its core, sexual harassment is about power, and politics is the ultimate power profession. And young people are particularly at risk.

headline.print_headline: As Politics Meets Power, Harassment Flourishes
headline.main: Why Sexual Harassment Persists in Politics

snippet: At its core, sexual harassment is about power, and politics is the ultimate power profession. And young people are particularly at risk....
abstract: Increasing willingness of women to come forward with accusations of sexual harassment reveals such abuses are especially entrenched within world of politics and legislatures; women recount rampant harassment in profession in which heightened power dynamics are conducive to sexual misconduct.
